#Data Wrangling: 

```{r}
seki_raw <- read_csv(here("processed-data", "analysis 2.0", "seki_flam_data_all.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  filter(model == "HP") %>% 
  mutate(location = "seki")

unique(seki_raw$year_month)

czo_raw <- read_csv(here("processed-data", "analysis 2.0", "czo_flam_data_all.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  filter(model == "HP") %>% 
  mutate(location = "czo")

unique(czo_raw$year_month)

sierra_raw <- bind_rows(seki_raw, czo_raw) %>% 
  select(-precip_2month, -precip_2mo, -x1, -video_notes_57, -video_notes_58, -gr, -lfm)

sierra_df <- sierra_raw

sierra_df %>% 
  write_csv(here("processed-data", "analysis 2.0", "sierra_flam_data_all.csv"))
```
